About.title: About Me
About.sobre: I'm a developer who is passionate about what I do. I often say that those who do what they like live on vacation. That's why I'm always wanting to learn something new that will help me to be a better and better developer. I have 1 year of experience and I have worked both in the back-end and in the front-end, using React, React-Native, MySql, Node.Js.

Project1.title: My Portfolio
Project1.description: This is my personal website, the one you are currently on :). Developed with React, Tailwind, APIs.

Project2.title: L.A Soft Solutions
Project2.description: This is a project to showcase the company L.A SOFT SOLUTIONS. Developed with React and Tailwind.

Project3.title: Restaurant Management
Project3.description: This is a restaurant management and service system project called HEST. Developed with React, Node, Tailwind, MySQL.

Project4.title: To-Do List
Project4.description: A to-do list project that stores inputted data in local storage. Developed in HTML/CSS/JS VANILLA.

Project5.title: Hortifruti Website
Project5.description: Hortifruti website, React, Node, Tailwind, MySQL.

Project6.title: Product Registration
Project6.description: Product registration system using Node to build an API and connect to MySQL. Developed with React, Tailwind, MySQL, Node.

Project7.title: Postal Code Finder
Project7.description: Look up your address using your postal code. Developed with React and CSS.
